title: #678 Dog spa, Game room, 24 hour fitness center
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 561 Sq.
OUR BRAND NEW, luxury apartments are located in the vibrant, walk-able Jack London District of Oakland.
Fourth Street East offers spacious studio, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom homes and lofts with luxurious finishes and amenities.
Many of the 330 living spaces come with private balconies overlooking the Oakland waterfront.
Top floor mezzanine loft spaces include private outdoor patios, providing views of downtown and the Oakland Hills.
Interior touches include high-end appliances, solid surface countertops, modern cabinetry with upgraded hardware as well as faux wood flooring.
You can also view our video <URL>

Smart Nest thermostat, Slow-close cabinets and drawers, Kitchen island, Private decks, Floor-to-ceiling windows, Keyless entry for residence doors, Private rooftop terraces, Soaking tubs, Wood-look luxury flooring, Custom MechoSystem roller shades, French door, stainless refrigerator, Spacious walk-in closets, Walk-in showers, Waterfall edge quartz counters, Recessed lighting, Smart light switch, Luxury tub with tile surrounds, Full-size vented washer and dryer

Pool and Spa, Co-working lounge, DIY workshop, 2000+ sq ft. fitness center, 24 hour package storage, Grilling areas, Transit screens, Controlled-access building, Electric car charging station, Library lounge, Rentable storage units, Pet spa, Fireside lounges, Chef's kitchen, Game room, Bike room, Private dining room, Rooftop sky deck/lounge
